_header: The high Father of bliss above
_description: James Ryman, an Annunciation carol — eight stanzas rhyme royal and burden: ‘In criste ihesu be we alle gladde / By whome oure joye endeles is hadde’

CULEe112.First Lines:
The high fader of blisse aboueHathe sent his sonne to take
                    nature…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…ffor criste hath brought mankyende fro wooAnd fro the fende
                    oure mortall foo

Zupitza,  Julius,
